hero.title: Darwin Luque: Software Engineer
hero.description: I am a software engineer with a passion for building scalable software solutions. I work with a variety of technologies to create software solution that are fast, secure, and easy to use.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am a software engineer who loves to build things. I have a background in software development and have been working in the industry for over {plusYears} years. I have experience in building web applications, mobile applications, and APIs. I am passionate about technology and enjoy learning new things. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow.

humble.title: Humble
humble.description: I value humility, embracing a mindset of openness, continuous learning, and self-awareness. It's about recognizing our strengths while staying grounded and respectful of others.

helpOthers.title: Help others
helpOthers.description: I prioritize helping others, striving to make a positive impact in both professional and personal settings. Whether through mentorship, volunteering, or collaboration, I believe in lifting others up and fostering a supportive community.

mastery.title: Mastery
mastery.description: I pursue mastery, dedicating myself to continuous improvement, innovation, and excellence in my craft. It's about pushing boundaries, honing skills, and striving for the highest level of proficiency and expertise.

expertise.title: My Expertise
expertise.description: I offer expert frontend, backend, and DevOps expertise to meet your unique project needs. Explore below to see how I can help you achieve your goals.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: Crafting visually stunning and highly interactive user interfaces using modern web technologies. Specializing in responsive design, ensuring optimal performance across all devices.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: Building robust and scalable server-side applications. Expertise in database design, API development, and server management to ensure seamless and secure data flow.

devops.title: DevOps
devops.description: Implementing efficient and automated deployment pipelines to streamline development processes. Ensuring high availability, scalability, and security of your applications.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am a software engineer who loves to build things. Get to know me better.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: A brief welcome message introducing myself.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: A concise summary of who am I, my background, skills, and interests.

myExpertise.title: My Expertise
myExpertise.description: A list of expertise I offer, including frontend, backend, and DevOps expertise.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: My professional experience, including positions, companies, and projects.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: A collection of projects I have worked on, including open-source projects.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.description: What people say about me and my work.

education.title: Education
education.description: My educational background, including courses, certifications, and degrees.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: A list of skills I have acquired over the years.

contactMe.invitation: I am always open to new opportunities and collaborations. If you have a project in mind, want to discuss a potential partnership, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out to me.

form.title: Contact Me
form.description: Want to get in touch? Fill out the form below to send me a message.
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.subjectPlaceholder: Enter the subject of your message
form.messageSentError: An error occurred while sending the message.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Explore my professional experience, including my roles, responsibilities, and achievements. I've worked with various companies and teams, contributing to the development of software solutions that drive business growth and innovation.

softwareEngineer.description: Collaborated with project managers to define ambitious yet achievable coding milestones for pre-release software projects, revised, modularized, and updated legacy code bases to meet modern development standards, and contributed to the successful completion of multiple projects for high-profile clients such as Wendy's and Takeda.

techLead.description: Led a team of software engineers, provided technical guidance, directed the architecture and design of software projects, and collaborated with international clients, including Simera, and Stellantis, to understand their needs and deliver technical solutions.

engineeringManager.description: Directly guided software developers in their careers, monitored their performance, mentored and developed engineering talent, streamlined development processes, and managed the successful delivery of software projects for diverse international clients, ensuring high standards of quality and client satisfaction.

supportHero.description: Provided prompt email support for Duet Display, a multi-platform display sharing app for Apple, Windows, and Android. Delivered top-tier assistance, resolving inquiries and issues to ensure exceptional user experiences.

itSupport.description: As part of my college scholarship program, I served as an IT Support Specialist, providing technical assistance exclusively to college staff members. In this role, I diagnosed and resolved hardware and software issues, configured computer systems, and ensured the smooth operation of IT infrastructure. Additionally, I assisted with network troubleshooting, documented support tickets, and contributed to enhancing the efficiency of college staff members' technology experience.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Explore my portfolio showcasing innovative projects that reflect my expertise, creativity, and dedication to excellence. Each project demonstrates my ability to tackle challenges and deliver impactful solutions.

anotherBlogApp.title: Another Blog App
anotherBlogApp.description: A simple blog app built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

afm.title: Advance File Manager
afm.description: A file manager with workspaces builts with Next.js, tRPC, and Tailwind CSS.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.description: Read what my clients and colleagues have to say about working with me. Their testimonials highlight my professionalism, expertise, and commitment to delivering high-quality work. I take pride in building strong relationships and exceeding expectations.

education.title: Education
education.description: Explore my academic background, which underpins my expertise in Engineering. I've pursued studies at various institutions, honing my skills and knowledge in the diverse realms of engineering. My educational journey reflects my commitment to continuous learning and growth.

college.title: Mechatronics Engineering
college.description: In this program, I learned about the integration of mechanical, electrical, and computer engineering to create intelligent systems. I also learned about robotics, automation, and control systems.

highSchool.title: High School Diploma
highSchool.description: During my time in high school, I learned about the basics of science, math, and literature. I got the oportunity to participate and win in multiple math, and chess contests.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Discover my technical and soft skills, which enable me to excel in my work. I've developed a diverse skill set that encompasses various programming languages, tools, and methodologies. My skills enable me to tackle complex challenges and deliver innovative solutions.
